title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The bug report does not provide details about the observed behavior.
EB: Add a private constructor. There are no non-static methods in this class, so it would be a good idea to have a private constructor. This will prevent people from instantiating the class unnecessarily. It will not add any size because the compiler provides a free public constructor. Instead, make the constructor private.
SR: Change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4); I haven't tested it, but it should achieve the same result.
